name: Viral Displacement
description:
This is my first published game, and my first game jam participation!

Viral Displacement was made in less than 72 hours, for the Completion Game Jam.

Guide a computer virus to each levels mainframe, but beware of nasty antivirus. Sometimes it may be impossible to traverse a level, but fear not. Whenever your virus dies, you may have a look at the file placement (pieces of the level), and swap files around. This enables you to create a possible path through each level.

Controls:
Move towards mouse with "W"
Shoot using left mouse button

When swapping files:
Pan the camera using "WASD" Click on two files to make them swap place

Notes:
Made for 1920x1080 resolution

Thanks for playing, and have fun.

- VinciDa
